ui.panel.profile.current_user: You are currently logged in as {fullName}.
ui.panel.profile.user_settings_detail: The following settings are tied to your account and will persist across all sessions and devices.
ui.panel.profile.client_settings_detail: The following settings are local to this client only, and may reset to defaults on logout or when local data is cleared.
ui.panel.profile.logout_text: Are you sure you want to log out?
ui.panel.profile.force_narrow.descriptio: This will hide the sidebar by default, similar to the mobile experience.
ui.panel.profile.customize_sidebar.heade: Change the order and hide items from the sidebar
ui.panel.profile.customize_sidebar.descr: You can also press and hold the header of the sidebar to activate edit mode.
ui.panel.profile.vibrate.description: Enable or disable vibration on this device when controlling devices.
ui.panel.profile.enable_shortcuts.descri: Enable or disable keyboard shortcuts for performing various actions in the UI.
ui.panel.profile.suspend.description: Should we close the connection to the server after being hidden for 5 minutes?
ui.panel.profile.push_notifications.head: Push notifications
ui.panel.profile.push_notifications.add_: What should this device be called?
ui.panel.profile.time_zone.description: Velg tidssonen som skal brukes for å vise tidspunkter.
ui.panel.profile.dashboard.description: Pick a default dashboard for this device.
ui.panel.profile.change_password.error_n: Entered new password values do not match
New password must be different than current password
ui.panel.profile.change_password.logout_: Ønsker du å logge ut fra alle enheter?
Dette vil kreve at du logger inn på nytt på alle enheter med ditt nye passord, inkludert denne.
ui.panel.profile.change_password.delete_: Not all devices could be logged out
ui.panel.profile.mfa.confirm_disable: Are you sure you want to disable {name}?
ui.panel.profile.advanced_mode.title: Avansert modus
ui.panel.profile.refresh_tokens.descript: Each refresh token represents a login session. Refresh tokens will be automatically removed when you click log out. Unused refresh tokens will be automatically removed after 90 days. The following refresh tokens are currently active for your account.
ui.panel.profile.refresh_tokens.confirm_: The refresh token for ''{name}'' will never expire. Disabling token expiration can reduce security. Only disable token expiration on devices that are infrequently used (+90 days between use).
ui.panel.profile.refresh_tokens.disable_: Failed to disable refresh token expiration
ui.panel.profile.refresh_tokens.enable_e: Failed to enable refresh token expiration
ui.panel.profile.refresh_tokens.confirm_: The refresh token for ''{name}'' will be permanently deleted. This associated device will not have access anymore.
Are you sure you want to delete all refresh tokens? These associated devices will not have access anymore. Your current session and long-lived access tokens will not be deleted.
ui.panel.profile.refresh_tokens.delete_f: Failed to delete the refresh token.
ui.panel.profile.refresh_tokens.current_: Unable to delete current refresh token
ui.panel.profile.long_lived_access_token: Create long-lived access tokens to allow your scripts to interact with your Home Assistant instance. Each token will be valid for 10 years from creation. The following long-lived access tokens are currently active.
Learn how to make authenticated requests.
Are you sure you want to delete the long-lived access token for {name}?
Failed to delete the access token.
Failed to create the access token.
Copy your access token. It will not be shown again.
You have no long-lived access tokens yet.
